posts.subject: Random Thread
posts.body: Post random pictures, folks, it's what this board is for.

posts.subject: Welcome to 08Chan's CYOA Board
posts.body:
Nobody else replicated this board for the bunker yet, so I thought I'd put it up.  Starting off with the Branching Heart CYOA.  I have a massive soft spot for Flo.  Who do you prefer?

Also, friendly reminder to mute all CPniggers.

posts.body: Am I the only one who thinks 8Chan isn't coming back?  Without CloudFlare protection, it's a sitting duck for DDoS's, and I have a sneaking suspicion it'll be blasted by one every time it tries to come back up.

posts.subject: Balloonies?
posts.body:
Anyone else here with a thing for inflatable critters?  Spoiler'd because it's pretty niche.

EDIT:  Looks like I screwed up, and uploading through Tor still doesn't work.

>>09d8d550-52ef-49ab-b542-107d57272ddb
Honestly, I can't veer my mind away from a 4-family bunker, with 4 Anons with each of the 'cores.

>>8fde5ecf-630f-4b95-8e65-20dd5172022a
Might as well fill in my own choices.

>Orb of Life, Welfare, Surveillance
This was kind of a toss-up for me, Dream Home + Employment was a close second.

FLO (balloonie alien chick)
>flying
This strikes me as the most useful choice.  Weather doesn't bother me and Pick-me-up is just unnecessary (like she says, I can just kiss her anyway).  Besides, this way we can get into the Mile High Club without a vehicle, especially with...
>Lightweight, Gust
Pump Up would be great... for a girl.  But combining the other two SHOULD allow for not-quite flight, and with her serving as primary transport I wouldn't have to worry about falling anymore.  Plus, while it's left unspoken whether laying on top of her would squish her, Lightweight would eliminate that issue.
>Soap Star
Sky Realm looked kinda neat too, but again, less useful (there's already the sky in normal space).  The Fan just doesn't appeal to me.
>Enhancement
Not really a fan of the appearance changes for myself, but since it allows me to FUCKING SPACE JUMP with the two Air Boosts I'm taking it.

Flo's a type of character/being that's just massively appealing to me in a way that's only partly sexual.  And honestly, being able to fly free with her, holding onto her and letting go of worries, is damned appealing.  We may need to improve her sense of humor, though - I figure I'd start by showing her the complete filmography of the Marx Brothers.

EDIT:  I'm aware of the Tor-uploading issue.  A fix was posted on /b/ or /pol/, don't remember which, that essentially was to disable fingerprinting prevention.  I'm wary of leaving that setting on for myself, but can't speak for you.

posts.subject: CYOAs
posts.body:
Just wanted to advertise the CYOA board I created, figured posting in the sticky would be better than starting its own thread.  I kicked the board off with Branching Heart, which has a handful of Monster Girls in it, so I'm confident some of you (us?) would be interested.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/18GZefftXtaTYwumGGk1monWbBzno5ENkW:cyoa:97d7bf8d-6a32-443a-9dee-34d3479213db

posts.subject: A New Elemental
posts.body:
>Element
Light.  Seems to have a pretty good weakness/resistance profile, provides flight while I'm essentially still solid (and clothes can easily solve the transparency problem).  By the way, I'm putting avian wings on my new form, since they're not just cool but thematically appropriate.
>Sub-Powers
Hue, Illusion
I can draw whatever I want in the air, in any color I want, while changing my own coloration as I see fit (more human face/skin coloration, imitating skintight clothing, etc.)
>Enchantments
Perfection, Imbuing.  Perfection is the main prize here, and I'm going with Laser Beam.  I was also interested in Possession and Harmony, but... eh, they rely on other individuals.
>Item
Mana Crystal.  I plan on staying with this sorcerous gal anyway, so most of the others will probably be available anyway.  But having this thing tuned to me would certainly be handy, either as a battery, or a Reserve Tank a la Super Metroid.
>Quests
Lewds, Pen Pal.  Honestly I'm down for everything on this list, especially after hitting up the Anchor; but this girl's clearly into me, and I'm not about to pass that up, while her friend seems to need help ASAP... not to mention I'm pretty sure that Light will be well-suited to fighting demons.

Back when I lurked 4Chan's CYOA threads, I didn't see this one get posted very often.
